Package org.activebpel.rt.bpel.server.transreceive

This package contains the transmission tracker and it's related classes.

See:
          Description

Class Summary
AeInMemoryTransmissionTracker In memory implementation of the transmission tracker.
AeNoopTransmissionTracker Transmissiond Id tracker used in the in memory configuration.
AePersistentTransmissionTracker Implements the persistent version of a transmission manager which is required for durable invokes and durable replies.
AeTransmissionTrackerEntry Entry containing transmission id, state and associated message id.
 

Package org.activebpel.rt.bpel.server.transreceive Description

This package contains the transmission tracker and it's related classes. The transmission tracker helps track durable invokes (e.g. subrpocess, reliable messaging).
